Fix for White Screen Issue


If all you get is a white screen and audio when you load the game, you may be able to fix the issue by changing your shortcut to the hl2.exe to look like this:
"C:\Program Files\Half-Life 2 Episode Two\hl2.exe" -game ep2 -dxlevel 81 +mat_forcehardwaresync 0

The "C:\Program Files\Half-Life 2 Episode Two\" part should of course be the folder to which you've installed the game.

I found this information in the main post on The_Unstopable's Portal release page: http://forum.digitalpowered.info/index.php?showtopic=15612


If you have any other questions, perhaps you will be able to find the answers here:
http://forum.digitalpowered.info/index.php?showtopic=18309

As a side note, the bin files are compressed archive files containing all of the files included in this rip. When you run the installer it simply extracts everything from the bin files and puts the data into your specified location.

You DO NOT need to manually open the bin files.

6. go back to the .rar file you downloaded and open the "hl2" files then the "shaders" file (you'll notice they are the same)

7. Drag those files in the .rar into the shaders file (the one that you deleted the files from)

Let them paste and what not and TADA! No more white screen!
